health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Ahmed Salama, Hon. (Ms.) Mbura, Hon. Bwire, Hon. Samba, Hon. Mwamwiri, Hon. Hatimy, Hon. Kitula
health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions on renovation of county health residential houses, illegal construction of houses, and implementation of various plans/projects in the department of lands, planning, and housing.
health_data_challenges: Challenges in the approval and legality of construction projects.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Comprehensive reports and site visits for better decision-making.
health_sector_decisions: Plans to appoint an Ad hoc Committee for comprehensive reports.
health_evidence_base: Mombasa County Government Act, relevant laws, and regulations.
health_evidence_requested: Detailed statements and reports regarding health infrastructure projects.
